amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce highway project authorization funding and transit project authorization funding by approximately $18 billion during fiscal years 1998 through 2003.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 4 in part 2 of House Rept. 105-476, to reduce funding authorized in the bill for highway and transit high-priority projects by $11.3 billion.
